website_summaries.verdict: A game-ready outfielder's glove that is light and comfortable.
pros: Features an open back and deep pocket designed for outfielders
H web helps outfielders snag ground balls, fly balls and line drives with ease
Can be used right away with no break-in period
cons: Fit may be too tight for adults with big hands

customer_reviews.title: Akadema AH0224A
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult male 6' 200 lbs with large hands & I could not get the glove to fit. It went on but would not cover the base of my hand. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: bzblah

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Glove!
customer_reviews.text: I love the glove. Again I love most nice baseball gloves. It’s not quite as slow and broken in as I had expected. I still needed to break it through practices for a month before ai trusted it in a game.
customer_reviews.author: GJIII

customer_reviews.title: Decent Glove, more of a second glove
customer_reviews.text: I got this glove because my old wilson was running thin on me. It's good glove but takes forever to break in. I have had it for 3 months and its just now starting to wear itself to me. I like this glove, but loved my last one. That could be why its 3 stars and not 4
customer_reviews.author: Martin N

customer_reviews.title: Really small
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I just need a far bigger size but I ordered a 13" glove. I'm 6-3 with average hands for a guy that size and I could barely get it on. The glove was also far stiffer than I would have imagined. Its getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: I really like this glove
customer_reviews.text: I really like this glove. It did take a little while to get broken in, and it probably isn't for people with bigger hands, but it fits my hands nice, and its nice and light, the only complaint I have is I wish id have gotten the 13.5" glove.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dahme

customer_reviews.title: XL HAND FITS SNUG IN GLOVE
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff but in a good way. Relaced the back strap to give more space for my hand to fit. I wear XL batting gloves, the mitt fits snug.
customer_reviews.author: Skycrane

customer_reviews.title: but great build.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the mitt. Takes a little bit of time to break-in, but great build.
customer_reviews.author: SWenzel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leather quality & feel - small fit if you have average/large hands
customer_reviews.text: The pocket and leather are great. This is a real quality glove. I was actually surprised at how small the fit was for my hand. Though I don't have giant hands by any stretch, the finger (stalls) pocket depth is too shallow and the heel of my palm sticks out of this glove about 3/4" further than it should. Everything else about this glove is great. It's all about fit, so I'm not knocking it down too much (1 star) for it's slightly smaller fit... than what I expected for a 14" glove. If you wear smaller than size-L gloves, this might be a good fit for you and you'll have a great glove.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Dupre [The Power of Neutrality®]

customer_reviews.title: Good glove fit was small.
customer_reviews.text: Great glove at a great price. My only complaint is the fit seems a bit small. Returned the glove.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the glove is excellent. The fit is perfect! I would reccomend this glove to anyone.

I was quite surprised when I saw the glove that showed up. Thanks!

product_meta.title: Akadema AHO224 ProSoft Series Glove
product_meta.description: 13” pattern, H web, open back and deep pocket designed for outfielders. Great for softball. Born to meet the desire of players looking for the distinct advantage of a game-ready glove, the ProSoft Series is Akadema's newest innovation. Light and playable right out of the workshop, the Silver Soft Series was constructed to give a player the unparalleled fit and feel right off the bat. Right or Left hand throw.
